    • addService

      public <SERVICE_INTERFACE> boolean addService(Class<SERVICE_INTERFACE> serviceInterface, SERVICE_INTERFACE serviceInstance) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
      Description copied from interface: ServiceRegistry
      Adds the given service using the fully qualified class name of the serviceInterface as service endpoint id.
      Specified by:
      addService in interface ServiceRegistry
      Returns:
      true if the serviceInstance was added, false if the serviceInstance was added already
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if another service was already registered for the given service Id
      IllegalArgumentException

    • addService

      public <SERVICE_INTERFACE> boolean addService(String serviceEndpointId, Class<SERVICE_INTERFACE> serviceInterface, SERVICE_INTERFACE serviceInstance) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
      Specified by:
      addService in interface ServiceRegistry
      Returns:
      true if the serviceInstance was added, false if the serviceInstance was added already
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if serviceEndpointId == null or serviceInstance == null
      IllegalStateException - if another service was already registered for the given service Id

    • registerAsMBean

      public void registerAsMBean(@Nullable MBeanServer mbeanServer, @Nullable String mbeanName)
      Parameters:
      mbeanServer - if null, the platform mbeanServer is used
      mbeanName - if null, an mbean name based on the package and class name of the registry is used

    • removeService

      public boolean removeService(String serviceEndpointId, Object serviceInstance) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Specified by:
      removeService in interface ServiceRegistry
      Returns:
      true if the serviceInstance was removed successfully, false if the given serviceInstance was not registered
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if serviceEndpointId == null or serviceInstance == null
